issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: ti.cloud module methods are not responding on MobileWeb when building from Windows

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
** This issue is a result of a patch that had gotten run against ti.cloud to fix a different issue.  I removed the patch and this issue no longer exists.  You can close this issue and I will open a different issue for the problem that the patch was fixing.  Thanks!!  **

-------------------------------------
require('ti.cloud') is not working in MobileWeb projects.

It does not have any of the methods that it should have on the object such as CreateUser, etc.

I am not doing anything special.  Just out-of-the-box usage of ti.cloud on MobileWeb.
fields.summary: Cannot use Ti.Cloud commonjs module with MobileWeb

comments.body:
Hello! 
We tested the cloud module, and looks like working with mobile web. 

Best Regards!
